data.title: Actor Michael Madsen on "Once Upon a Time in Hollywood" and his new documentary
data.meta_description: Actor Michael Madsen has a new documentary called “American Badass” that he hopes to get into festivals. He tells Carlos Amezcua and Lisa Remillard of BeondTV how Quentin Tarantino got involved and talks about some of the famous faces you’ll see in the film. Plus, Michael talks about his roles in “Once Upon a Time […]
data.text: Actor Michael Madsen has a new documentary called “American Badass” that he hopes to get into festivals. He tells Carlos Amezcua and Lisa Remillard of BeondTV how Quentin Tarantino got involved and talks about some of the famous faces you’ll see in the film. Plus, Michael talks about his roles in “Once Upon a Time in Hollywood” and “Kill Bill” 1 and 2.
